CustomField.description: BM 7/16/2013 - added for Svcs SF Interfaces Project. This is the description for IFC Indicator which is more meaningful than the one-character code.
CustomField.formula: CASE ( IFC_IND__c , 'B', 'Product is standard on aircraft', 'U', 'Upgrade of standard product available', 'N', 'Equipment has been certified and installed on aircraft or is an OEM option on the aircraft', 'S', 'Potential to certify and install equipment on aircraft', 'L', 'Currently no potential to certify and install equipment on aircraft or product is not applicable to aircraft', 'Other' )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the description for IFC Indicator which is more meaningful than the one-character code.
CustomField.label: IFC Description
